item.title: yarns made in Michigan
item.description: An unnamed reader of this blog searched for the phrase "yarns made in Michigan" and found some page here that wasn't the best answer for that query; let's fix that. Spun and dyed in Michigan: Stonehedge Farm and Fiber Mill in East Jordan, MI makes and sells the Shepherd's Wool line of yarns, The three-ply yarn is spun to 1000 yards per pound, which in 4-ounce skeins is 250 yards per skein.
